ygData.subject: RE: [shadowknight] Name change / Some quesstions
ygData.msgSnippet: Killing frogloks only lowers your faction with Frogloks of Guk.  It doesn t raise any faction. ... From: (Sabbat) [mailto:vtemplarv@uswest.net] Sent: Tuesday,
ygData.messageBody:
RE: [shadowknight] Name change / Some quesstions

Killing frogloks only lowers your faction with Frogloks of Guk.  It doesn't raise any faction.

-----Original Message-----
From: (Sabbat) [mailto:vtemplarv@...]
Sent: Tuesday, March 07, 2000 12:36 PM
To: '(Shadowknight)'
Subject: [shadowknight] Name change / Some quesstions


From: "(Sabbat)" <vtemplarv@...>

Grrrrr!
Well I deleted Lasombra last night to change his stats around and the system
wouldn't let me use the name again. So Sabbat is the new me. Yes, I know you
are all thrilled to death. As a side note: at 1st level 10 Stamina = 1 HP.

I bought my Grobb Cleaver when I had my TSK and am seeking infomation from
those that have done the quest personally, DE xp preferred. I know the
basics of the quest. Kill Nerbilik in OOT and get 3 HEHE meat from Oggok,
give the recipe and meat (not stacked) to Carver. I also know that you can
accidentally eat those stupid meats as well.

Now for my questions.
1) What does Carver need to /con to recieve the Grobb Cleaver
(indifferent/amiable/warmly)?
2) What faction is Carver tied to?
3) As a DE SK what faction hit do you take when you kill Nerbilik? Will
killing him make me KoS if I haven't raised faction first? All I could find
was "you take a massive faction hit with trolls" which doesn't tell me
didly.
4) Is Lyguna tied to Troll Shaman faction?

I haven't killed a Froglock in a while, so I assume killing Froglocks
increases all Troll faction if killed in the swamp. If so I will do this to
increase faction in Grobb before I attempt this quest.

p.s.- Wake up this list! The only mail I have seen is stuff I have sent and
replies to it.

--
Sabbat
DE SK
1st Tier of Hate
